author: Associated Press
title: President Trump Says He Is Suspending Immigration to the U.S.—but Offers No Details
description: President Donald Trump said that he will sign an executive order “to temporarily suspend immigration into the United States” because of the coronavirus.
content:
(WASHINGTON) — President Donald Trump said Monday that he will sign an executive order “to temporarily suspend immigration into the United States” because of the coronavirus.
